frontmatter.title: Migrating an Astro Website to Ghost: A Comprehensive Guide
frontmatter.description: Step-by-step guide to migrate your Astro website to Ghost CMS, enabling content management and creation within Ghost. Perfect for developers looking to switch their Astro site to a headless CMS.
